note: Indiana General Assembly provides a free public API that requires registration. To enable Indiana events: 1) Visit https://docs.api.iga.in.gov/ to register for a free API key, 2) Set INDIANA_API_KEY environment variable with your token, 3) Restart the application. The API provides real-time committee schedules and bill information.

calendarSources.name: Indiana General Assembly Committee Daily
calendarSources.description: Daily House and Senate committee meeting schedules
